body_html:
The C library (tensorflow.dll) that is required (and used via cgo) is available for Windows (see related #8773 (comment)).

I'm not familiar enough with the use of cgo and dynamic libraries in Windows to provide a useful answer. However, if someone else can provide instructions then please share, or better yet, send in a pull request updating tensorflow/go/README.md.
body_text:
The C library (tensorflow.dll) that is required (and used via cgo) is available for Windows (see related #8773 (comment)).
I'm not familiar enough with the use of cgo and dynamic libraries in Windows to provide a useful answer. However, if someone else can provide instructions then please share, or better yet, send in a pull request updating tensorflow/go/README.md.
body:
The C library (`tensorflow.dll`) that is required (and used via cgo) is available for Windows (see related https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/8773#issuecomment-349414677).

I'm not familiar enough with the use of cgo and dynamic libraries in Windows to provide a useful answer. However, if someone else can provide instructions then please share, or better yet, send in a pull request updating `tensorflow/go/README.md`.
